Package org.oddjob.monitor.action

Actions which may be performed on a Job.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddJobAction
    An action that adds a child job to a job.
    DesignerAction
    The action that corresponds to the Oddjob Designer action.
    DesignInsideAction
    The action that Designs the inside of a ConfigurationOwner.
    ExecuteAction
    An action that executes a job.
    ForceAction
    An action that loads Forces Forceables.
    HardResetAction
    An action that performs a hard reset on a resetable.
    LoadAction
    An action that loads Loadables.
    SetPropertyAction
    An action that sets a property on a job.
    SoftResetAction
    Perform a soft reset action.
    StopAction
    Implement a stop action.
    UnloadAction
    An action that loads Loadables.

Package org.oddjob.monitor.action Description

Actions which may be performed on a Job.
